byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: MF Global's fate, which looks cloudier than ever, ultimately lies with its chief executive, Jon S. Corzine, according to Richard Repetto of Sandler O'Neill & Partners.
snippet: MF Global's fate, which looks cloudier than ever, ultimately lies with its chief executive, Jon S. Corzine, according to Richard Repetto of Sandler O'Neill & Partners.
lead_paragraph: MF Global's fate, which looks cloudier than ever, ultimately lies with its chief executive, Jon S. Corzine, according to Richard Repetto of Sandler O'Neill & Partners. From Mr. Repetto's research note, published on Wednesday: "We believe the success of MF Global will ultimately be Mr. Corzine's legacy and whether he's viewed as going out 'on top or not,' and we suspect he is aware of the same." Previously »
